Knowing exercise change brain activity improve memory help researcher understand memory work improve people memory problem . This study compare two kind exercise stationary bike ability temporarily improve memory certain test . Researchers look effect exercise body chemistry draw blood collect saliva . DOC.brief_title: Effects Exercise Memory Healthy Brain-Injured Individuals
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : The goal study 1. replicate finding exercise exposure image enhances subsequent recall , 2. extend question word logical rule , 3. examine mechanism effect use exercise biomarkers fMRI 4. explore usefulness aid memory individual traumatic brain injury ( TBI ) . Study population : Healthy adult volunteer individual TBI . Design : The main , clinical , experiment parallel , repeated-measures design , four group ( two healthy subject participant TBI ) encode picture , word rule exercise either high low ( placebo ) intensity . Recall test one hour seven day exercise . Blood saliva collect immediately exercise assayed biomarkers exercise , think possible mediator memory effect . In parallel-design fMRI experiment , intend explore brain basis effect exercise memory , healthy volunteer view picture , exercise high low intensity , perform recall task scanner . The analysis look difference location extent evoke brain activation evoke picture recall low high intensity exercise . Outcome measure : The primary outcome measure recall visual material one hour exercise . Secondary measure recall word list letter/digit symbol matching ( logical memory ) activation fMRI . The blood saliva biomarkers include exploratory outcome .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : < TAB > Age 1845 ( inclusive ) English speaking write For TBI patient : < TAB > History TBI ( define accord American Congress Rehabilitation Medicine Criteria : History sustain traumatically induced physiological disruption brain function least 2 month participation ) Evidence least moderate TBI severity . Evidence intensity TBI one follow 3 criterion : 1 . GCS great equal 9 ( obtain Emergency Room note medical record ) 2 . Posttraumatic amnesia > 24 hour 3 . TBIrelated abnormality neuroimaging ( either CT MRI ) Documented memory deficit , i.e. , score 1 standard deviation ageadjusted norm recognize clinical test memory , Wexler Memory Scale , within last two year . Enrollment Protocol 11N0084 Righthandedness fMRI participant EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Inability give informed consent History major neurological psychiatric illness , e.g. , neurodegenerative disorder , stroke , congenital genetic disorder , currently symptomatic major depressive disorder , schizophrenia History exercise intolerance Any finding examination indicative cardiac respiratory compromise History heart disease History pulmonary disease , control , nonexerciseinduced asthma History uncontrolled diabetes Resting heart rate > 100 BPM Resting systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg diastolic blood pressure > 100 mmHg Peripheral condition make completion exercise protocol impossible , severe osteoarthritis chronic pain Pregnancy For healthy subject undergoing MRI : Ferromagnetic metal cranial cavity eye , e.g . aneurysm clip , implanted neural stimulator , cochlear implant , ocular foreign body Implanted cardiac pacemaker autodefibrillator pump Nonremovable body pierce Claustrophobia Inability lie supine two hour Any structural brain abnormality , tumor stroke
